alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 12:55PM PST until January 07 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM SATURDAY TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches above 4,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Piute Walker Basin, Tehachapi, Grapevine and Frazier Mountain Communities Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM Saturday to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel could be very difficult to nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is a 53 percent chance of at least a tenth of an inch of snow on the Grapevine.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
